scripts.testapilocal: newman run postmanDemo.postman_collection.json -e Local.postman_environment.json -r junit,cli --reporter-junit-export result-tests-local.xml
scripts.testapiQA: newman run postmanDemo.postman_collection.json -e QA.postman_environment.json -r junit,cli --reporter-junit-export result-tests-qa.xml
